reviews.review:
Dead by Daylight - игра уникальная в своем роде. Только здесь:
•Твой профиль будет весь в -rep от ноющих сурвов
•Токсиков можно наказать со всем удовольствием, всеми возможными способами
•Пати, которые будут Т-бегать в воротах и щёлкать фонариком под бладварденом
•Делаешь мементо на 4 сурвах и получаешь минус каплю к рангу
•Нытики, ноющие по каждому нерфу перков для сурвов
Обожаю эту игру. Если в доте ты можешь только зарепортить чела, который фидит и ломает шмотки, тут ты их наказываешь по полной программе

Wholesome and depressing, but mostly depressing. Why did I put the hours into this game? I have no idea, I need a new hobby. Would I recommend, absolutely, as long as you have some friends. Solo queuing can absolutely suck and killer is pretty cool. If you look forward to toxicity, this is your game. Click click click click click click click click click click
Uwielbiam tę grę. Nie dość, że można podnieść sobie poziom adrenaliny, to fajnie spędzić czas ze znajomymi uciekając do wirtualnego horroru. Polecam!
Симулятор похода за хлебом в Сызрани. 12/10
O jogo e bom dmsss e recomendo, mais se vcs tiverem problema de coração como eu, recomendo vcs irem de pouco em pouco, me acostumei em 5 hrs jogando, mais vcs podem levar mais tempo

jogo muito bom, só abro ele pra ficar ouvindo o Michael Myers respirando na minha orelha, aquele gostoso q

falando serio agora, se não fosse por boa parte da comunidade ser toxica o jogo seria muito melhor, mas no seu geral é bem divertido, quando tu não pega esse tipo de gente em partidas.

나는 오늘도 희생제로 출근한다. 
처음에는 엔티티님의 스카우트로 회사에 입사했다. 우리 가족은 굶지 않아도 된다고 기뻐했다. 
하지만 돌아오는것은 겨우 빛바랜 엠블럼 4개와 블포 팔천개였다.
이걸로 집에 가족들을 부양하기에는 너무 적기에 휴식시간을 줄여 희생제에 한번이라도 더 들어갔다. 
상사의 판자는 너무 아팠고 직급이 높으신분들은 어깨에 칼을 찌르고 눈을 멀게해서 괴로웠다.
그래도 블포를 벌어야 준구가 35렙까지 교육을 받을 수 있기에
그래도 핏빛파편을 얻어야 토구에게 명품 신상퍽 불멸을 선물해 줄 수 있기에
그래야 하기에
이것밖에 못해주는 이 못난 아비인
나는 오늘도 희생제로 출근한다.

                                                                                                                     [종구- 가장의 무게]

So been playing this game on and off for the past 2 years only playing when i been getting bored. From my opinion it's a type of game you wont play for hours unless your playing with friends but it's still a fun game. There is a lot to grind for the best perks for survivors or killers to have on other people which gives it a lot play ability and some perks can be so broken but do get nerfed by the dev's which shows they aren't just ignoring the community.
There can however be some toxic to the community. (Tunnelling, Face camping, Playing specific killers.... cough cough Bubba cough). I mean hey check out my comment on my profile to show i'm getting -rep for playing specific killers because they can down you with 1 power. But then again you can get some survivors that will loop you around pallets for days. 
As the big streamers from DBD will say ... it's not about the perks that will make you good at the game it's the amount of hours you put in because you will know when to rescue or do gens as a killer or when to chase someone or to just leave them and go for someone else. 
Final comment :- DBD is a fun game that requires hours in it to get good at the game. Killers have pro's and cons same as the survivors but is fun for a couple hours unless you are playing with friends.
你喜欢这个游戏吗，那你就不要开挂。
